TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ToolBarButtonClickEventHandler(object sender, ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ToolBarButtonClickEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ToolBarButtonClickEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs)
public delegate void ToolBarButtonClickEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 代表將處理 之 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需處理事件的委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會具現化和三個控制項。The following example instantiates a and three controls. 工具列按鈕指派給按鈕集合、 集合指派給工具列和工具列加入至表單。The toolbar buttons are assigned to the button collection, the collection is assigned to the toolbar, and the toolbar is added to the form. 在工具列的事件屬性評估時，並開啟適當的對話方塊。On the event of the toolbar, the property of the is evaluated, and the appropriate dialog opened. 此程式碼假設、 、 ，和具現化。This code assumes that a , an , a , and a have been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
